channel.title: Compiler Error
channel.description: Alright I am using jdk1.6.0_06 for my compiler and this is the error: [code]javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code] Here is my compiler code: [code]@echo off color 0F "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code] Please Help

item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @jackin_jill jackin jill
item.description:
@jackin_jill wrote:

you need to register your jdk, a window should have popped up telling u to after u finished the installation.
it specificaly states that if you do not register the jdk none of the installation will save. meaning the most important part (javac)
will not be saved into your jdk file, therefore it will not be found.

thats why is says “javac file not found” means exactly that.

your solution.= register jdk.

Read full topic

@Bigbucks wrote:

you need to know what version of java you have. then change the
\jdk1.6.0_06
to the version you have =D like mine is

\jdk1.6.0_07\

item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Linksys Mr. Linksys
item.description:
@Mr_Linksys wrote:

Alright I am using jdk1.6.0_06 for my compiler and this is the error:

javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
Here is my compiler code:

@echo off color 0F "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
Please Help

Read full topic
